welcome: Welcome on Dscanner! Coded by ExAlePloit (@Aless1010)!
modality_choice:
1) Connect other Dscanners to this one.
 2) Connect this Scanner to another one.
 Choice:
permanent_choice:
Do you want to always use this option?
 1) Yes
 2) No
 Choice:

client.first_setup:
Chose the port you want to use to connect the other Dscanners
 Press enter to use the default one (4100)
 Choice:
client.error_port_range: The ports you put must be greater than 1024 and minor than 65536.
client.stop_connection_question:
Type /stop if you want to stop the connection.
 Input:

server.first_setup: Welcome, before continuing we need to set up the command you will use (it could be changed).
server.menu:
1) Scans Manager.
 2) Dscanner Manager.
 3) Settings.
 4) Exit.
 Chose:
server.scan_manager:
1) Start a new scan.
 2) View results
 3) Back.
 Chose:
server.dscanner_settings:
1) Qubo Command.
 2) Change Language.
 3) Back.
 Chose:

qubo_command_settings.pingcount: 1) PingCount (How much time qubo will ping a server):
qubo_command_settings.fulloutput: 2) Whole OutPut: (The result of the scan will be saved on a heavier, but more readable file.):
qubo_command_settings.filtermotd: 3) Motd Filter: (Only shows the servers with the chosen motd):
qubo_command_settings.noping: 4) No Ping: (Qubo won't ping a server before it get scanned):
qubo_command_settings.minonline: 5) Min Online: (Only shows servers that have a greater number of players online than the chosen number):
qubo_command_settings.portrange: 6) Port Range: (Chose the range of ip qubo will scan):
qubo_command_settings.threads: 7) Threads: (Max number of threads qubo will use):
qubo_command_settings.timeout: 8) Timeout: (How long qubo will wait for the server's response):
qubo_command_settings.filterversion: 9) Version Filter: (Only shows servers with the chosen version):
qubo_command_settings.cant_exit: You can't exit, you have to fill required fields (Threads, Timeout, Port Range).

server.ask_ip: Put the Dscanner's ip you want to connect:
server.ask_port:
Put the port you want to use to connect the other Dscanners to this one.
 Press enter to use the default port (4100)
 Chose:
server.cant_start_scan: Before starting the scan you have to connect a Dscanner
server.started_scan: The scan started, go to the results section to view the results.
